p.k: Truffalo / Let It Snowball On the verge of a scientific discovery Seth and the other Fancies are forced inside when the town is invaded by cow-like Truffalo! But when Seth traps the Truffalo in order to resume his science he causes an environmental chain reaction that threatens to destroy Fancytown. / Seth wants to bring snow home so it'll earn him a coveted spot on his mom's prized shelf of stuff her kids gave her. When he repeatedly tries and fails to bring the snow back before it melts he uses science to figure out a way to get it home intact.
